    MatchMulti​(int numberOfPlayers)
    Call method of superclass, posInkwell will be initially set to '-1' and then it will be correctly modified just before the match's starting The Player ArrayList will be initialized at a fixed length

    • setCanChangeTurn

      public void setCanChangeTurn​(boolean canChangeTurn, Player player)
      Setter It will be invoked passing a true parameter as soon as a "main" PlayerMove is executed When is it invoked: - When a MarketInteractionPlayerMove is executed and NO WHITE Marble has to be converted - When a MarketMarbleConversionMove is executed - When a BuyDevelopmentCardPlayerMove is executed - When a EnableProductionPlayerMove is executed
      Specified by:
      setCanChangeTurn in class Match
      Parameters:
      canChangeTurn - boolean value to be set
      player - Player that perform the action
